reviewText: I always watch this lady she is wonderful I love the way she always finds the killer she is one of my favorites

I loved this show when it aired on television and love it even more now. Angela Lansbury is perhaps the best actress in film. She is just perfect...intelligent, sophisticated and such an elegant lady...she has more class than most actresses have ever dreamed of having. She made this show a hit and her supporting cast was fantastic. I love how she utilized stars that were once in demand but perhaps lost their appeal as they got older. I mean no disrespect to them because they all were fantastic in their prime and just as amazing on her show. I would bet that she had a hand in getting them work on her show and I admire that.

This item was priced just right because I had already purchased the entire season when it came out, but did not check out the entire season.  When I did check one side of the disk was blank so I did not want to spend a lot for a replacement.
This come shipped immediately upon myplacing the order and pricing was just tight.
